subject: MISS FELICIA JOHNSON
body:
MISS FELICIA JOHNSON
AUDITOR GENERAL
DEAR,
RE: TRANSFER OF US$15.200.000 00 MILLION TO YOUR ACCOUNT.
I feel quite safe dealing with you in this important business.
Though this medium (Internet) has been greatly abused, I choose to reach you through it because it still remains the fastest medium of communication.
However, this correspondence is private, and it should be treated in strict confidence.
At first I will like to assure you that this transaction is 100% risk and trouble free to both parties, In order to transfer out
FIFTEEN MILLION TWO HUNDRED THOUSAND DOLLARS, (US$15.200 000 00) from our bank here in Burkina Faso The fund for transfer is of clean origin.
The owner of the fund is a foreigner, a program leader who was believed to acquire the fund through his secret Crude Oil deal with the Former IRAQ government.
The deceased died with all the members of his family in an auto-accident in June 23, 2001 without a WILL.
The amount involved is US$15,200,000.00 and I want to transfer this money into your account as the foreign beneficiary of the fund.
I know that this letter will come to you as a  surprise as we don't know ourselves before, BUT BE SURE THAT IT IS REAL AND A GENUINE BUSINESS.
I CONTACT YOU BELIEVING THAT YOU WILL NOT LET ME DOWN ONCE THE FUND GOES INTO YOUR ACCOUNT.
PLEASE REPLY ME WITH THIS EMAIL ADDRESS (  
felicia000002johnson@gmail.com
 )
Let me hear from you.
Regards
Felicia

subject: Re:    MISS FELICIA JOHNSON
body:
Hello Felicia,

Wow, this sounds like a big deal! I'm surprised you reached out to me, but I'm glad you did. It's not every day that someone gets involved in such an important business matter.

I have a few questions though, if you don't mind. How did you find my contact information? And why did you choose me for this task? 

Also, could you tell me more about the deceased person and his family? It's so sad to hear they all died in an accident. 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Jared

subject: waiting for your urgent responds
body:
Dear friend,thanks for your mail and thanks for your readiness to
assist me in this transaction.Firstly let me introduced my self i am
Mrs Felicia Johnson Auditor General in my bank here in Burkina Faso,i
decided to claim this fund because i lost my husband few months ago
and leave me with three children to take care, i am the one taking
care of my children school fees,feeding and also of my family so that
is why i need this money so that i can be able to take good care of my
children and my family.

As you can see this fund have stay long in my bank for so many years
and no relations of the deceased that have come forward for claim of
ownership ever this years and now my bank want to keep this fund in
their bank treasury for use.Since the deceased person who own the fund
is a foreigner from Germany, so you as a foreign person can help me to
aply for claim of ownership in my bank and i will be here to back you
up with all the necessary Informations to avoid any problem.all i need
from you is your cooperation and understanding

As for the money, once it is transferred to your bank account i will take
60 percent why you will take 40 percent also i will come to your
country with my children to start a new life over there.

NOTE. As for your question i got your mail through this medium (Internet)
when i want searching for a reliable and trusted person who will help me
claim this fund and also who will not betrayed me when the fund is transfer
to his account

I will be waiting for your urgent responds so that i can forward you
the application form in writing which you are going to fill and send
to my bank for claim of ownership.
Thanks

Yours faithfully

Mrs Felicia Johnson

subject: Re: waiting for your urgent responds
body:
Hello Mrs. Felicia Johnson,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing your story with me. I'm sorry to hear about the loss of your husband and the challenges you're facing with your children. It sounds like a difficult situation.

I'm intrigued by this unclaimed fund you mentioned. Could you tell me more about it? How did it come to be in your bank's possession? And why has no one claimed it yet?

Also, I'm curious about the process of claiming ownership. What does it involve exactly? You mentioned a form that needs to be filled out - could you provide more details on what information is required for this?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Jared

subject: Hello Dear friend
body:
Dear friend, thanks for your mail and thanks for your readiness to assist
me in this transaction.As per the owner of the fund (US$15.200 000 00) MR
HENNIEH MARKER a Germany nationality, a program leader who was believed to
acquire the fund through his secret Crude Oil deal with the Former IRAQ
government is the one that kept it in my bank and he died with all the
members of his family in an auto-accident in June 23, 2001 without a
WILL.Since then there is not any relations any family members that have
come forward to claim the fund  (US$15.200 000 00) and because of that my
bank is planning to keep the fund in the bank treasury.

so you as a foreign person can help me to aply for claim of ownership in my
bank and i will be here to back you up with all the necessary Informations
to avoid any problem.all i need from you is your cooperation and
understanding

My dear friend nothing much is involve exactly, all i just need is your
cooperation and understanding so that we can claim this fund together,as
for the application  is a plan written form which you will fill all
personal informations and your bank informations which you will send  to my
bank with the email of my bank address which i will give you when i receive
your mail

subject: Re: Hello Dear friend
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out and explaining the situation to me. It sounds like a complex matter, and I'm sorry to hear about the unfortunate circumstances surrounding Mr. Hennieh Marker and his family.

I'm curious about how this process works. Could you please provide more details? For instance, what kind of documents would be needed for claiming ownership? And how does your bank usually handle such cases?

Also, I'd like to know more about the fund itself. How was it acquired by Mr. Marker? What was his relationship with the former Iraq government?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Jared

subject: Hello Dear friend
body:
Dear friend,how are you and your family?Hope you all are fine?Please i am
still waiting for your urgent responds so that i can send you the
application form in written which you will fill and send to my bank so that
they can start the process of the transfer.
